Package context.arch.discoverer.query


Class Summary
AbstractQueryItem<C1,C2> Design pattern : Composite An AbstractQueryItem is the abstract element to create queries.
ANDQueryItem  
BooleanQueryItem Richer version of AbstractBooleanQueryItem to support boolean operations (AND, OR, etc) on more than two child elements.
ClassifierQueryItem TODO: if each EnactorReference initializes their own QI at recovery time from DataObjects, then they each would have separate classifiers, and we lose the caching TODO: rename to WekaClassifierQueryItem?
ClassifierWrapper Adapter class to wrap a Weka Classifier to work with the Context Toolkit.
ClassifierWrapper.LRUCache<K,V> Use LRU (Least Recently Used cache; instead of FIFO) map storage of classification result of instances.
ElseQueryItem Takes its constituent queries and checks if any (OR) of them is true.
HmmQueryItem  
HmmWrapper  
HmmWrapper.BoundedSizeMap<K,V> Use LRU (Least Recently Used cache; instead of FIFO) map storage of classification result of instances.
NOTQueryItem  
ORQueryItem  
RuleQueryItem<C1,C2>  
RuleQueryItemND<C1,C2> QueryItem that can handle multiple dimensions (or attributes or element), rather than just one.
